name: MEMICSafetyExpertsPodcast
0:
”Alexa, open safety experts podcast.”
”Alexa, tell safety experts podcast play the latest episode.”
”Alexa, tell safety experts podcast browse recent episodes.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: safety experts podcast
des: Because safety is more than just a policy, practice, or personal protective equipment, the MEMIC Safety Experts Podcast hosted by Peter Koch will interview industry leaders every two weeks on the trends, tools, and techniques that are tried, tested, or emerging in the world of workplace safety. What you learn could save your life or the life of a friend or coworker, or at least save everyone from a few unnecessary cuts, burns and bruises. Make your work, and world, a safer place.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
